results.title: Comparison of the effect of glucose-lowering agents on the risk of atrial fibrillation: A network meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Based on the pooled results, GLP-1RA significantly reduced @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@/@<m>DISEASE_Atrial_Flutter</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001282 @@@AFL@@@ events compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (OR 0.17; 95% CI 0.04-0.61), @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ (OR 0.23; 95% CI 0.07-0.73), @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ (OR 0.20; 95% CI 0.07-0.86), and non-@CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylurea@@@ (OR 0.18; 95% CI 0.04-0.66).

citations.NLM: Shi W, Zhang W, Zhang D, Ren G, Wang P, Gao L, Chen H, Ding C. Comparison of the effect of glucose-lowering agents on the risk of atrial fibrillation: A network meta-analysis. Heart Rhythm. 2021 Jul;18(7):1090-1096. PMID: 33684547
